participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, Alex loves expressing herself through cosplay and enjoys an active lifestyle.
participant_1.background: The weather is okay, but I'm still happy. I live in North Dakota. I don't have any pets because I'm too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them. I went to Thailand once and it was an amazing experience. I like to do all my shopping at Walmart.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and passionate, Jordan has a deep appreciation for art and culture, which drives his desire to become a museum curator.
participant_2.background: I love gummy bears and never had kids. My idol is Thierry Henry. I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family. I want to be a museum curator. I have freckles all over my face.

content.text: Hi! I'm from North Dakota, how about you?
Hello! I'm from New York City. I've never been to North Dakota! What's it like there?
It's cold and snowy, but it's also beautiful. There's a lot of space and the people are friendly.
I've always wanted to go to Thailand! What was it like there?
It was amazing! The food was delicious, the people were so friendly, and the culture was so different from anything I've ever experienced before.
I've heard that the food is amazing! What's your favorite thing you ate there?
I loved the pad thai and the mango sticky rice.
Yum! Those both sound delicious! I'm definitely going to have to try them when I go.
You should! They're both very popular dishes.
I'm sure I will! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cosplay, work out, and go shopping.
Cosplay is so cool! I've always wanted to try it, but I'm not very creative.
It's a lot of fun! You should give it a try!
I might! What's your favorite thing to cosplay as?
I love to cosplay as characters from anime and video games
